p: Different types of culture media such as MYP (mannitol–egg yolk–phenol red–polymyxin–agar) and PEMBA (polymyxin–pyruvate–egg yolk–mannitol–bromthymol blue-agar) were used for detection and the selective isolation of Bacillus spp. from food. The selectivity of these media is based on the hydrolysis of egg yolk lecithin and the absence of the use of mannitol by Bacillus spp. besides the presence of selective compounds like polymyxin. 8
